ClassDesc: Indicates that an exception occurred while performing a ViewAction on the UI thread. A description of the @B_android#support#test#espresso#ViewAction_E@, the view being performed on and the cause are included in the error. Note: @B_android#support#test#espresso#FailureHandler_E@s can mutate the exception later to make it more user friendly. This is generally not recoverable so it is thrown on the instrumentation thread.
